business.headline: Explained: Why Tata Motors share price fell 10% todayTata Motors' stock has seen a steady decline over the past few months. It has fallen by 17.12% in the last five trading days alone. In the past six months, the stock is down by 39.42%. Over the last one year, it has lost 44.50% of its value.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 things to know about stock market crashDalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

All red, no green: Rs 19 lakh crore investor wealth erased on Dalal StreetAs of 9:38 am, the S&P BSE Sensex was down by 2,542.88 points, standing at 72,821.81. The NSE Nifty50 also saw a heavy fall of 810.90 points, taking it down to 22,093.55.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

Sensex crashes 3,000 points, Nifty tumbles as Trump tariffs hit global marketsShare market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex crashed 2564.74 points to 72,799.95, while the NSE Nifty50 tanked 831.95 points to 22,072.50 as of 9:24 am.

Stocks to watch on April 7: Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd BankShares of firms such as Tata Motors, ITC, L&T, Nykaa, IndusInd Bank, Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders, TVS, Bajaj Housing Finance, YES Bank etc. will be in focus today due to important developments.

Asian markets plunge as Trump tariffs spark global sell-off; Nikkei dives nearly 8%Asian markets tumbled sharply following Wall Street's crash, triggered by Trump's tariff escalation and Beijing's retaliation. Japan's Nikkei led the losses, diving nearly 8%, as recession fears gripped investors.

Asian markets suffer huge plunge as Trump's tariffs make Wall Street bleedFutures markets moved swiftly to price in almost five-quarter-point cuts in US rates this year, pulling Treasury yields down sharply and hampering the dollar.

'Black Monday': US expert warns Trump tariffs could trigger worst crash since 1987Jim Cramer warned that markets might face a bloodbath similar to 1987 - when the Dow Jones suffered its biggest single-day crash to date. He claimed that if the US President didn't 'reach out' to nations which have not imposed retaliatory tariffs and reward them for their compliance, the situation could worsen.

Piyush Goyal announces helpline for startups days after 'dukandari' jibe at themDays after questioning the innovation of Indian startups overtly focussing on food delivery and betting and fantasy sports apps, Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal announced a helpline for startups if they wanted to make suggestions or file complaints.

How China-US trade war unfolded: A timeline of tariffs and countermovesChina is responding forcefully to Trump's latest tariffs with a 34% tax on US imports, rare earth export curbs, company bans, and WTO action, raising fears of another full-blown trade war.

Jaguar Land Rover to suspend shipments to US over tariffs on BritainJaguar Land Rover, which is owned by India's Tata Motors, confirmed the temporary export suspension after the Times newspaper reported the plan.

entertainment.headline: Mohanlal's Thudaram locks April release, actor unveils new posterAfter Empuraan, Mohanlal is set to star in the family-drama Thudaram. Directed by Tharun Moorthy, the film will release in April.

No heroes, No villains: Test examines life's morality in thrilling Super OverMadhavan, Nayanthara and Siddharth-starrer 'Test' is an intense drama exploring the morality of the lead characters. The film is streaming on Netflix.

Sikandar box office Day 8: Salman Khan's biggest dip so far, even behind Jai Ho'Sikandar' is Salman Khan's 18th film to enter the Rs 100 crore club. It is, however, the lowest Rs 100 crore grosser on that list. The film collected Rs 102.25 crore after eight days domestically.

Dia Mirza hits back at Revanth Reddy over use of AI clip on Gachibowli tree fellingBollywood actor Dia Mirza has refuted claims by the Telangana Chief Minister that she shared AI-generated fake videos of tree felling in Gachibowli. She urged the CM to verify the facts before making accusations.

Comic Samay Raina reacts to Tony Kakkar's new song with an emotional audio noteStand-up comedian Samay Raina thanked singer Tony Kakkar in an emotional audio note, after he released a song titled Shat Pratishat. The song is seemingly a reply to trolls who attacked Raina and his sister, Neha Kakkar.

Empuraan box office Day 11: Mohanlal's film's unshaken global run amid controversy'L2: Empuraan' is only Rs 2 crore short of hitting a century at the domestic box office. However, the Mohanlal-starrer has already emerged as the highest-grossing Malayalam film of all time globally.

I swear I'll die: Jasleen Royal breaks down into tears after Coldplay concertAfter facing backlash from a Coldplay concert, singer Jasleen Royal reveals she isn't formally trained. She shares her emotional struggle and determination to continue her musical journey.

We are not afraid: Prithviraj Sukumaran's mother on tax notice amid Empuraan row'Empuraan' director Prithviraj Sukumara was issued an income tax notice last week - a development that followed the political controversy that erupted over the film's original content. The actor-director's mother reacted to the issue.

Scene or fan encounter? Man grabs Sreeleela as Kartik walks away in viral videoIn a viral video, actor Sreeleela can be seen being forcibly dragged by a fan. However, the internet is now curious if this was a scene from a film or a shocking fan encounter.

Did Rashmika Mandanna ring in her birthday with Vijay Deverakonda? Fans think soRashmika Mandanna rang in her 29th birthday on April 5. After sharing a few glimpses from her birthday bash in Oman, fans began assuming that Vijay Deverakonda was with her, and here's why.

Ajith Kumar's huge cut-out collapses causing panic among fans. Viral VideoA towering banner of Ajith Kumar collapsed at a Tirunelveli theatre in Tamil Nadu on April 6. A video of fans fleeing from the theatre has now emerged on social media.

Kolkata's Manasi Ghosh wins Indian Idol 15, takes home Rs 25 lakhThe winner of Indian Idol 15 is Manasi Ghosh from Kolkata. She not only won the trophy but also took home a brand-new car along with prize money of Rs 25 lakh.

Jujutsu Kaisen on Indian television: When, where to watch the anime on TVJujutsu Kaisen is set to premiere on Indian television, airing weekdays at 9:00 pm
 IST on Sony YAY! with Hindi and Tamil dubs. This marks its TV debut in India.

Sikandar no more? Chhaava had more occupancy on Day 51 than Salman Khan filmChhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal, surpassed Salman Khan's much-anticipated Eid release Sikandar in occupancy, drawing more footfall even on Day 51. This surprising turn of events highlights Chhaava's ongoing success as Sikandar struggles to gain traction despite its initial hype.

Fountain of Youth trailer: John Kransinski, Natalie Portman search for immortalityThe trailer of Guy Ritchie's upcoming film, Fountain of Youth, released recently. Starring John Krasinski and Natalie Portman, the film is a thrilling heist adventure.

Watch: Ranveer Singh, Deepika Padukone reunite on-screen after Dua's birthOne of Bollywood's favourite couple, Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh, delighted fans with a recent appearance, marking their first on-screen collaboration since welcoming their daughter, Dua.

Jack Black's A Minecraft Movie becomes a smash hit, revives Hollywood box officeJack Black's latest venture, A Minecraft Movie, has taken the global box office by storm. The film's success is a beacon of hope for Hollywood, showcasing the appeal of video game adaptations.

Peddi 1st glimpse: Ram Charan hits it out of the stadium in Buchi Babu Sana's filmOn the occasion of Ram Navami, the teaser for 'Peddi' starring Ram Charan was released, showcasing his striking new look. The film is set to hit theatres on March 27, 2026.

Parth Samthaan to join CID as new ACP after Shivaji Satam's exitParth Samthaan is set to be the next ACP in CID. He will be replacing Shivaji Satam, whose character ACP Pradyuman, was killed on the show.

general news.headline: Sensex crashes 3,000 points, Nifty tumbles as Trump tariffs hit global marketsShare market crash: The S&P BSE Sensex crashed 2564.74 points to 72,799.95, while the NSE Nifty50 tanked 831.95 points to 22,072.50 as of 9:24 am.

India to refrain from counter-tariffs on US despite market meltdown: ReportIndia is unlikely to impose counter-tariffs on the US  and is banking on a key clause in the executive order signed by Donald Trump last week.

Kerala minority outfit leader calls Muslim-majority district 'different country'SNDP yogam general secretary Vellappally Natesan sparked controversy by calling Kerala's Muslim-majority district Malappuram "a different country". This drew sharp reactions from IUML and others, even as he defended his remarks and accused critics of misrepresenting his intent.

Trump prescribes dose of painful 'medicine' as tariffs pummel global marketsAmid falling global markets due to his announcement of reciprocal tariffs,  US President Donald Trump said that "sometimes you have to take medicine to fix something".

'Hypocrites': Indian-origin techie confronts Microsoft bosses, quits over GazaFollowing the confrontation, Vaniya Agrawal dropped a scathing resignation letter, stating that her last day at the office would be April 11. She said she could no longer be part of an organisation that empowers 'oppressors' instead of the oppressed.

Sensex plunges 3,000 points: 5 things to know about stock market crashDalal Street is facing its worst trading session in a year, as Donald Trump's tariff shock has sparked a global rout and reignited fears of a looming recession.

1 killed, 6 injured after 'drunk' TV director's car rams crowd in Kolkata marketFollowing the incident, both people in the car were stopped by locals and beaten by the agitated crowd before being handed over to the police. As officers rushed to the spot to rescue them, an official told India Today TV that the co-passenger, Shriya Basu, appeared to be intoxicated and collapsed on the road.

Global stock markets crash as Donald Trump's tariff tsunami wipes trillionsDonald Trump's tariff salvo has triggered a global market meltdown, leaving investors rattled and economies on edge. Here's how markets from Wall Street to Asia are reacting to the unfolding chaos.

Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

University of Bath School of Management: A Pathway to Global Career SuccessBath's School of Management blends top academics, hands-on learning, and career support to help students secure jobs at leading global companies.

Startup founder from Burhanpur, MP, pours his heart out to Piyush Goyal | OpinionAfter Commerce and Industry Minister Piyush Goyal slammed Indian startups for the lack of innovation and a narrow focus on just e-commerce, a startup founder discussed, in a post on X, how difficult it was to do business in India. Murtaza Amin, who runs an IT services company, BizProspex, from Burhanpur in Madhya Pradesh, revealed the challenges faced by startups in India.

Shinde joke row: Kunal Kamra calls FIR malicious, approaches court to cancel itComedian Kunal Kamra approached the Bombay High Court, challenging the 'legality, correctness, and propriety' of the FIR registered against him in connection with the 'gaddar' jibe directed at Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde during his stand-up show.

We are not afraid: Prithviraj Sukumaran's mother on tax notice amid Empuraan row'Empuraan' director Prithviraj Sukumara was issued an income tax notice last week - a development that followed the political controversy that erupted over the film's original content. The actor-director's mother reacted to the issue.

Treated like worst criminal: Australian martial arts coach recounts US jail ordealRenato Subotic, who travelled to the US to conduct an MMA seminar, detailed his traumatic experience in a post on Instagram titled "From Seminar to Cell: My 24 Hours in a US Federal Prison, arrested for too much knowledge in MMA."

Bank fraud case: ED searches locations linked to Stalin minister KN Nehru, his sonThe Enforcement Director conducted searches at multiple locations connected with Tamil Nadu Minister KN Nehru and his son, Lok Sabha member Arun Nehru. The searches were reportedly conducted in connection with a Rs 22 crore bank fraud case.

Jasprit Bumrah is back: MI's bowling leader returns with season in balanceJasprit Bumrah returns to the Mumbai Indians squad at the right time with their IPL 2025 campaign in the balance. The star pacer will have his tails up and raring to go as he will be tasked with galvanising the team once again.

GT respond to Google CEO Sundar Pitchai after Washington IPL comebackWashington Sundar made a strong statement in his first IPL 2025 outing for Gujarat Titans, scoring 49 against his former team SRH. This 
 prompted the franchise to revive a supportive old tweet from Google CEO Sundar Pichai praising the all-rounder.
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

Forest department driver seen offering water to Kuno cheetahs fired: SourcesThe forest department had earlier issued an advisory to local villagers to maintain a distance from Jwala and her cubs, who were seen roaming beyond the core forest area, and not to offer them any food.

Cruel summer: Heatwave sears Gujarat, Rajasthan; mercury to touch 42°C in DelhiIMD has issued heatwave alerts for multiple states, including a yellow alert in Delhi, red in Gujarat, and orange in Rajasthan. Temperatures have soared above 40°C in many regions, with Barmer hitting a record 45.6°C. Authorities are urging precautions as conditions are expected to worsen in the coming days.

Did Rashmika Mandanna ring in her birthday with Vijay Deverakonda? Fans think soRashmika Mandanna rang in her 29th birthday on April 5. After sharing a few glimpses from her birthday bash in Oman, fans began assuming that Vijay Deverakonda was with her, and here's why.

BJP claims Hindus attacked at Ram Navami procession in Kolkata, cops reactThe BJP alleged targeted attacks on Hindus in Kolkata and blamed the Trinamool Congress, while police denied that any Ram Navami procession had taken place in the area.

Groom gives Rs 5,000 instead of Rs 50,000 for shoes, thrashed by bride's familyA groom was beaten up by the bride's family during an argument after he gave Rs 5,000 instead of Rs 50,000 to the bride's sister-in-law in UP's Bijnor. The bride's family called him a beggar, which led to an argument, and subsequently a fight.

Acid attack on Bihar BJP leader's daughter, Tejashwi Yadav blames state governmentUnidentified individuals threw acid on the 24-year-old daughter of BJP leader in Bihar's Begusarai while she was asleep at her home.

sports.headline: Jasprit Bumrah is back: MI's bowling leader returns with season in balanceJasprit Bumrah returns to the Mumbai Indians squad at the right time with their IPL 2025 campaign in the balance. The star pacer will have his tails up and raring to go as he will be tasked with galvanising the team once again.

MI vs RCB Live Score: Can Bengaluru handle Bumrah's return?Mumbai Indians (MI) vs Royal Challenger Bengaluru (RCB) Live Score, IPL 2025: As Jasprit Bumrah eyes a return to the grand IPL stage, his side Mumbai Indians, will be looking to make full use of it as they face Royal Challenger Bengaluru at the Wankhede Stadium.

SRH owner Kavya Maran left frustrated as Abhishek Sharma flops againSRH owner Kavya Maran looked visibly frustrated as her team slumped to their fourth straight loss in IPL 2025, with opener Abhishek Sharma failing yet again in what turned out to be another batting collapse against Gujarat Titans.

GT respond to Google CEO Sundar Pitchai after Washington IPL comebackWashington Sundar made a strong statement in his first IPL 2025 outing for Gujarat Titans, scoring 49 against his former team SRH. This 
 prompted the franchise to revive a supportive old tweet from Google CEO Sundar Pichai praising the all-rounder.

Inside Siraj's IPL renaissance: India snub heartbreak, reverse swing masteryMohammed Siraj's career has been a roller-coaster ride in the past few months, with the fast bowler facing several heartbreaks. However, the speedster has arrived at the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) having learnt his lessons and is putting a show for the ages at the T20 extravaganza.

SRH coach Vettori continues to back aggressive style despite GT thrashingAfter suffering their fourth loss of the season with a defeat to Gujarat Titans, SRH head coach Daniel Vettori still backed his team's aggressive style, insisting it can succeed again with better reading of conditions moving forward.

SRH's bowling and not batting hurting them the most in IPL 2025: Ambati RayuduAmbati Rayudu feels that SRH's bowling is hurting them more this season than their batting after losing to Gujarat Titans on Sunday, April 6. Hyderabad lost their 4th game on the trot.

Watch: Washington Sundar recreates famous Gabba six against Sunrisers HyderabadGujarat Titans all-rounder Washington Sundar re-created his famous six from the Gabba Test 2021 during his match-winning innings against Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

How Mohammed Siraj used India axe for IPL rebirth: Told myself my cricket isn't overGT pacer Mohammed Siraj revealed how he used the Indian team snub as motivation for his rebirth in IPL. Siraj picked up 4 wickets against SRH on Sunday in front of his home crowd.

Mohammed Siraj joins Jasprit Bumrah in prestigious IPL list after 4/17 vs SRHMohammed Siraj joined Jasprit Bumrah in an elite list of bowlers as he picked up career-best figures of 4 for 17 during the SRH vs GT clash on Sunday, April 6. Siraj has been in sensational form since joining GT.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

SRH's bowling and not batting hurting them the most in IPL 2025: Ambati RayuduAmbati Rayudu feels that SRH's bowling is hurting them more this season than their batting after losing to Gujarat Titans on Sunday, April 6. Hyderabad lost their 4th game on the trot.

How Mohammed Siraj used India axe for IPL rebirth: Told myself my cricket isn't overGT pacer Mohammed Siraj revealed how he used the Indian team snub as motivation for his rebirth in IPL. Siraj picked up 4 wickets against SRH on Sunday in front of his home crowd.

Mohammed Siraj joins Jasprit Bumrah in prestigious IPL list after 4/17 vs SRHMohammed Siraj joined Jasprit Bumrah in an elite list of bowlers as he picked up career-best figures of 4 for 17 during the SRH vs GT clash on Sunday, April 6. Siraj has been in sensational form since joining GT.

IPL 2025: Sundar, Siraj special adds to Hyderabad's agony as Gujarat march onGujarat Titans beat Sunrisers Hyderabad by seven wickets in Match 19 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) and registered their third consecutive win of the season. Mohammed Siraj (4/17) and Washington Sundar (49 off 29) were the top two performers for Gujarat.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
